review: It arrived already registered to my Amazon account, it was super easy to install & super quick on screen set up... I love my Fire TV Stick!!!
author: Marisol Fuentes

review: Excellent product, very responsive and fast. I also have a Fire TV and, except for the no vocal option on the remote, I don't see a significant difference between the two. Tried chrome cast and roku stick and at its current price the fire TV stick is the best bang for your buck!
author: Sorin M

review: Works pretty well.  Fairly easy to set up according to my wife who set it up.  She does have fair electronics knowledge.I am disappointed with the price of TV shows. I did not expect to have to pay for a lot of the really good stuff. i.e. "The Walking Dead" is like 14.99 a season.  From the ad I assumed these were included (free) in the monthly Prime fee. I am also disappointed with the music as I seem to already have much of this on my Amazon Music app (free).  I have not yet tried the music stations although these were one of the reasons for purchasing Prime.
author: mach1

review: Amazing! Easy set up and great programming.
author: David

review: Still looking through it but so far, I love it.
author: tina rackley

review: Great product- streams VERY fast and without issues.  Seems to be a little more responsive than the Roku streaming stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is a lot better than Chromecast. It has its own remote which is a necessity for me. The only problem(s) I have is the sound sometimes doesn't sync with the actors' mouths and sometimes there are skips or hesitations in the audio & video...
author: Jerry Hargrove

review: Got the first on for $19 and loved it, no issues at all, so I ordered a second one and even though it's near router, seems to be a few issues. Very jumpy during hulu etc, and stick isn't on tv, no electro interference. Needs a little more work.
author: DB

review: Wide selection of movies great for rainy days.
author: Daryl Yuuki
